spell2.name: BAST'S DESCENT
spell2.description: Summon Bast, pouncing forward, dealing damage, and attaching a Vibranium Mark to enemies hit while refreshing Spirit Rend.

spell3.name: SPIRIT REND
spell3.description: Lunge forward and deal damage to enemies. Vibranium Mark produces Bonus Health and refreshes the ability.

spell4.name: SPINNING KICK
spell4.description: Spiral forward and attach a Vibranium Mark to hit enemies

spell5.name: SUBTLE STEP
spell5.description: Hold Space to run on a wall; perform a jump after detaching from the wall.

spell6.name: SPEAR TOSS
spell6.description: Toss a Vibranium energy spear forward, creating a Vibranium Force Field and attaching a Vibranium Mark to enemies in its radius.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Arced projectile that generates a spell field upon impact

spell7.name: PANTHER'S CUNNING
spell7.description: Deal higher damage when at low Health.
